HDG.BC.content: Being like the fleeting cloud of a shadow, like that which doesn’t effect (bewirken) anything or leave behind a trace (Spur) [khōra]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Being like the fleeting cloud of a shadow, like that which doesn’t effect (bewirken) anything or leave behind a trace (Spur) [khōra]

HDG.FS.content: meaning of hypothesis, thus theory, has changed: “assuming that…” as purely methodological, no ontological significance > Heidegger on exactitude of modern experimentation, yield identical repeating results, obstructs description (Beschreibung), concerns the effect (Wirkung) [cf. p. 54]: theory will change if effect does not follow, thus purely methodological
HDG.FS.linkedContent: meaning of hypothesis, thus theory, has changed: “assuming that…” as purely methodological, no ontological significance > Heidegger on exactitude of modern experimentation, yield identical repeating results, obstructs description (Beschreibung), concerns the effect (Wirkung) [cf. p. 54]: theory will change if effect does not follow, thus purely methodological

HDG.CCP.content: [will as cause & effect] every will wants to actualize, have actuality as its element > the risk that Gelassenheit sounds like the denial of the will to live [Schopenhauer] > power of action & resolve also reign in Gelassenheit [these will mistakenly seem to pertain to will]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: [will as cause & effect] every will wants to actualize, have actuality as its element > the risk that Gelassenheit sounds like the denial of the will to live [Schopenhauer] > power of action & resolve also reign in Gelassenheit [these will mistakenly seem to pertain to will]

HDG.EC.content: freedom is not ruling or effecting
HDG.EC.linkedContent: freedom is not ruling or effecting

HDG.EC.content: nationality: pure subjectivity of a people, relies on its “Nature” as what’s actual (Wirkliche), and all effecting (Wirken) comes from and goes back to this “Nature” > in subjectivity, man asserts himself as ground/measure of what’s actual > thus emerges (entspringt) the uprising (Aufstand) into work as form of achievement through which devastation of earth becomes unconditional [in German one more sentence than in English: Das einzige Gesetz der Verwüstung ist, dass das Nötige das Nötigste und das allein Nötige sei] > business of devastation: work for sake of increased possibility of work [Marxish?]
